mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as author from RemoteConfigParam a LEFT JOIN User b on a.uid=b.id where envid=#{envid} order by updateTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RemoteConfigParam(`name`,`value`,envid,`comment`,`uid`, `type`,`platform`, updateTime) SELECT `name`,`value`,#{0},`comment`,#{1},`type`,`platform` FROM RemoteConfigParam a WHERE a.envid = #{2};
mapper.update: UPDATE RemoteConfigParam SET `name`=#{name},`value`=#{value},`comment`=#{comment},`uid`=#{uid},`platform`=#{platform}, updateTime=null where id=#{id}
